# datadog_on_call_user_notification_channel (Resource)

Provides a Datadog On-Call user notification channel resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `user_id` (String) ID of the user to associate the notification channel with.

### Optional

- `email` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--email))
- `phone` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--phone))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--email"></a>
### Nested Schema for `email`

Required:

- `address` (String) The e-mail address to be notified
- `formats` (List of String) Preferred content formats for notifications


<a id="nestedblock--phone"></a>
### Nested Schema for `phone`

Required:

- `number` (String) The E-164 formatted phone number (e.g. +3371234567)
